name: Emperium
description:
You awake in a world both unknown and dangerous.
You must aid to stop an ancient threat that's awakening once more.
Fight mighty beasts and collect amazing loot!

Emperium is a loot focused dungeon crawling rpg with 10 unique classes and hundreds of pieces of loot.
Styled after MMO's like World of Warcraft and FFXIV, Four leveling zones and 1 max level zone.
- 4 leveling dungeons and 4 max level dungeons
- A System allowing you to replay max level dungeons at higher difficulties to give greater rewards.
- An extensive max level progression system that culminates in an 8 boss raid instance
- An in game calendar with holidays and various other events
- Own and farm your own materials, or go gather them from the open world
- And much more!

Plans include support for the game for at least a year after release, patches include dungeons, raids and new systems. All patch content will be free.
